replies.body: "With one snap of this finger, half of the ADC will disappear"

Good riddance, I say.

At least until Riot caves and reverts crit, then it's back to being one shot by a crit marksman constantly.
Are you trying to tell me that right now you aren't getting 1 shot by nearly everything?

I play {{champion:83}} or {{champion:6}}, mostly, so now I can build armor and it's **actually** effective against the enemy team now that there's not a crit marksman who shreds my armor running around one shotting squishies, and killing non-tanks in 3 autos 24/7.

It means I don't have to be a full tank Maokai, or a Tryndamere to do my jobs of frontlining and splitpushing.

In other words, because I play mostly fighters in the toplane, and since Crit-based ADCs were made trash, I can actually play the fucking game now.

Not sure how good it is after the true damage added to infinity edge but were you ever building Randuin and Tabi before? Because it's hell to play against that combo as any crit reliant auto attack champion.

Yeah, but it can only help so much when they are also shredding my armor.

On the receiving end, Randuin's helped a bit, but nowhere near as much as some people think. And Tabis stopped being effective after someone finishes an item. And the damage crit deals makes the auto reduction pretty worthless later in the game.

True damage is whatever, unless it's % Max HP true damage, I can just build more max HP, and I can survive it.

I'm not saying True damage is good or bad, but I am saying that more health helps unless they are dealing true damage based on your max health, you CAN do something about it.

With crit and old infinity edge, surviving wasn't an option unless they were brain damaged.

> [{quoted}](name=Somber Rites,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=omNEWEWv,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2018-07-26T03:06:52.931+0000)
>
> Good riddance, I say.
> 
> At least until Riot caves and reverts crit, then it's back to being one shot by a crit marksman constantly.

Yeah, except the thing that made them one shot early is now forever gone from the game... IE's +50% crit damage passive. Ignorant post.

Yeah, until they cave to people whining and revert that.

Uh, are you okay?

> [{quoted}](name=WAR321,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=omNEWEWv,comment-id=000100010001,timestamp=2018-07-26T18:33:04.407+0000)
>
> Yeah, except the thing that made them one shot early is now forever gone from the game... IE's +50% crit damage passive. Ignorant post.

"reverting crit" would entail reverting IE, which is part of crit. ignorant post.

>
> "With one snap of this finger, half of the ADC will disappear"

''With one snap of this finger, half of the Junglers will dissapear'' too

LOL
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

> [{quoted}](name=Javi Is Here,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=omNEWEWv,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-07-26T00:08:27.662+0000)
>
> "With one snap of this finger, half of the ADC will disappear"

3/4
More like "With one snap of this finger, half of the player base will disappear."

I prefer ADC's in bot since at least they're actually super fragile until they get GA and need to scale up.

They're the true definition of a glass cannon.
ADCs are still easily the overwhelming majority of the champs played bot though.

**Every** botlane champion with a sub-50% winrate **except for Vladimir** is a marksman.

Half of the top 10 ADCs right now are marksmen, the top 4 are Quinn (a ranged assassin, not a marksman), Yasuo (melee, not a marksman), Heimer (annoying as fuck turret-placing shithead that is *not* a marksman), and Veigar (shittons of AP, but not a single bit of AS in sight, and not a marksman).

For fuck's sake, just because ***PLAYRATE*** is still high doesn't mean the class is good. Yasuo has a high playrate, but nobody's good at him. Playrate=/=good, meta, or viable. Playrate=playrate.
Quinn is a marksman, she has abilities that buff her autos and she is encouraged to stay back and fight. What makes her different from a Jhin who also built duskblade?

You need to work on your reading comprehension because I never said anything about whether or not marksmen were good. But on that note, marksmen are fine despite your cherry-picking and misrepresentation. There's several with winrates above 50% (Jinx, MF, Twitch, Jhin, Quinn) and below that most of them are at least 48% which is **far** from bad.

Also, how is playrate not indicative of the meta?

> [{quoted}](name=Cancer Champ,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=omNEWEWv,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-07-26T11:10:31.262+0000)
>
> ADCs are still easily the overwhelming majority of the champs played bot though.

As it should be. I'd rather have an ADC strong meta over an assassin/diver meta.

Being against a team of aatrox top, Galio/Garen/Talon/Zed mid, and Heimerdinger/Swain bot  with Fiddles/Rakan/Pyke  supp with some Wukong jungler feels like total shit to play against compared to what used to be tank top, mage mid, ADC bot.

> [{quoted}](name=Crescent Dusk,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=omNEWEWv,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2018-07-26T17:08:15.527+0000)

I know right adc meta is so "fun" I love getting hit constant 600+ crits especially with cait and her 1k empowerd auto or when twitch comes out of stealth and just presses R and melts your entire team Or with trist melting your health bar from 500+ range with the attack speed of a machine gun wait no that's kog. So "fun" man. Tank top lane is the most boring non interactive way to play the game but I guess that's you marksmen mains like your top laners bored, depressed and totally reliant on bot lane to win.

well tbh removing ADCs didn't cause the current meta, it just made it more noticeable.

I think it's totally worth if they fix the meta
Is that a zombified Annie and Ryze?
